uvi.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.14.14
uvi.description:
drm/msm/submit: fix overflow check on 64-bit architectures

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.14 by commit 00ba7a3951f4ea7c91b29e2bfbb3a4ecf72bf542, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 20224d715a882210428ea62bba93f1bc4a0afe23. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/submit: fix overflow check on 64-bit architectures
